course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: IBPC2021 Reimagine Education during COVID-19 and Beyond
course.description: COVID-19 pandemic has created the largest disruption of education systems in history, affecting 1.6 billion learners in more than 190 countries and all continents. Case challenge is, “How might we reimagine education during COVID-19 and Beyond?”  Students will be equipped through a combination of online learning, in-person workshops, experience sharing by EdTech industry leaders and startup founders.  There will 6 days when each team will receive 2 hours of private coaching by industry experts or VC, for potentially meeting over 10 industry executives. Enrollment in the project course requires approval of the course instructor.
